lg.l: A place where wishes and reality meet

Dump your body onto burning flames

Paint it black

Inside there's a race with no winner
Run away from Champagne on ice
History will show him no favor
Staring at the melting time
Waiting for the stars to shine
Powered by the dream
When logic has no vacancy
A one night stop
Soon becomes a lifetime
